title: Passion
text: Technology has been a great part of my life for as long as I can remember. Becoming an IT specialist was one of my best choices.

title: Agility
text: Being able to quickly respond to today's changing environment is paramount to any business relationship.

title: Trust
text: Working hand in hand with clients as Business Analyst has taught me of great importance of trust in business.

title: Communication
text: I find that open communication is the key to efficient product delivery as well as a catalyst for maintaining successful relationships.
